resp = client.indices.create(
    index="idx",
    mappings={
        "_source": {
            "mode": "synthetic"
        },
        "properties": {
            "date": {
                "type": "date"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="idx",
    id="1",
    document={
        "date": [
            "2015-01-01T12:10:30Z",
            "2014-01-01T12:10:30Z"
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)
